name: Diamond Sky -- Prototype UE4 3d Platformer
description:
This game was heavily inspired by Zineth and Crackdown. With this game I wanted to create 3D platformer that emphasized freedom, speed, and flow.
The look of the game is inspired by Futurefunk and Vaporwave aesthetic.

The music is a mixtape created by

天真爛漫アドベンチャー💘 : First Mixtape

You can listen to it here:

https://soundcloud.com/tenshinranman/first-mixtape
